Package com.caoccao.javet.interop.options

Class V8Flags

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caoccao.javet.interop.options.V8Flags
  • public final class V8Flags
extends java.lang.Object
    The type V8 flags defines some built-in V8 flags. The complete flag definition is stored in v8/src/flags/flag-definitions.h
    Since:
    0.7.0

      • setMaxHeapSize

        public V8Flags setMaxHeapSize​(int maxHeapSize)
        Sets max heap size.

        Currently, by default V8 has a memory limit of 512mb on 32-bit systems, and 1gb on 64-bit systems. The limit can be raised by setting --max-old-space-size to a maximum of ~1gb (32-bit) and ~1.7gb (64-bit), but it is recommended that you split your single process into several workers if you are hitting memory limits.

        Please refer to One small step for Chrome, one giant heap for V8 for detail.

        Parameters:
        maxHeapSize - the max heap size
        Returns:
        the self
        Since:
        0.9.13
